descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Desmond Bane drives through the Kings defense and finishes strong at the hole to extend the Grizzlies' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Desmond Bane impresses with nice bucket) 2021/11/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Desmond Bane goes coast to coast and finishes strong for the bucket

videos.description: Dillon Brooks drives to the basket and throws it down with some authority.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dillon Brooks skies for big dunk) 2021/11/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dillon Brooks muscles through the paint for the two-hand jam

videos.description: Tristan Thompson finishes with the and-1 layup after an acrobatic assist from Chimezie Metu.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Chimezie Metu makes a sweet dish) 2021/11/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chimezie Metu finds Tristan Thompson who finishes with the and-1

videos.description: Ziaire Williams drains the fadeaway bucket after a sweet assist from Steven Adams.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet dish from Steven Adams) 2021/11/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ziaire Williams knocks down the fadeaway jumper

videos.description: Despite being fouled Tyus Jones knocks down the floater for an impressive and-1 basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyus Jones drills bucket vs. Sacramento Kings) 2021/11/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyus Jones drains the floater for the and-1

videos.description: Brandon Clarke rocks the rim with a two-hand drunk after an assist from Tyus Jones.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brandon Clarke rocks the rim with powerful flush) 2021/11/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brandon Clarke soars through the paint for the two-hand flush

videos.description: Jaren Jackson Jr. powers through and fakes out the Kings defense for a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jaren Jackson Jr. buries shot against Sacramento Kings) 2021/11/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jaren Jackson Jr. fakes out a Kings defender to finish with an easy layup
